```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
source("helper.R")
```

```{r}
raw_data <- read.csv("data/master.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
q <- "What.is.your.usual.level.of.pain..how.does.your.pain.feel.most.of.the.time.."
t <- "What is your usual level of pain (how does your pain feel most of the time?"
q_data <- get_single_selection_0(data = raw_data, q.name = q) %>%
  filter(response != "")
q_n <- length(unique(q_data$id))
q_mean_data <- as.numeric(as.character(q_data$response))
q_mean <- mean(q_mean_data) %>%
  round(3) %>%
  print()
q_plot<- clean_single_select(q_data)
r <- plot_single_select(q_plot)
r
```


```{r}
q_plot2 <- rbind(q_plot, t)
dir.create("output/q9_usual_pain")
ggsave(filename = 'output/q9_usual_pain/q9_usual_pain.png', plot = r, device = 'png')
write.csv(q_plot2, paste0("output/q9_usual_pain/q9_usual_pain_", q_n,".csv"), row.names=F)
write.csv(q_data, 'output/q9_usual_pain/q9_usual_pain_ids.csv', row.names = FALSE)
```
